{"id":542999166,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1629739042,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/542999166/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"5.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isHappy(int n) {\n        if(n==1||n==7)\n            return true;\n        if(n>1&&n<10)\n            return false;\n        \n        while(n>9)\n        {\n            long long int s=0;\n            while(n!=0)\n            {\n                int a=n%10;\n                s=s+(a*a);\n                n=n/10;                \n            }\n            if(s==1||s==7)\n                return true;\n            else if(s>1&&s<10)\n                return false;\n            else\n                n=s;\n            \n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number"}
